name: NSMetadataQueryResultGroup
desc: The NSMetadataQueryResultGroup class represents a collection of grouped attribute results returned by an NSMetadataQuery object.

items.name: results
items.desc: An array containing the result group’s result objects.

items.name: resultCount
items.desc: The number of results returned by the result group.

items.name: result
items.desc: Returns the query result at a specific index.

items.name: subgroups
items.desc: An array containing the result group’s subgroups.

items.name: results
items.desc: An array containing the query’s results.

items.name: resultCount
items.desc: The number of results returned by the query. (read-only)

items.name: result
items.desc: Returns the query result at a specific index.

items.name: index
items.desc: Returns the index of a query result object in the receiver’s results array.

items.name: groupedResults
items.desc: An array containing hierarchical groups of query results. (read-only)

items.name: valueLists
items.desc: A dictionary containing the value lists generated by the query.

items.name: value
items.desc: Returns the value for the attribute name attrName at the index in the results specified by idx.

items.name: enableUpdates
items.desc: Enables updates to the query results.

items.name: disableUpdates
items.desc: Disables updates to the query results.

items.name: operationQueue
items.desc: The queue on which query result notifications are posted.
